questions:
What is the main subject of the photo?
A) A building
B) A water tower and a bridge in a foreground
C) A bridge
D) A tree

What word is written on the water tower?
A) Jackson
B) Jefferson
C) Washington
D) Lincoln

What is the color of the water tower?
A) Red
B) Yellow
C) Blue and white
D) Green

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) Trees
C) Power lines and a power pole
D) A lake

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A grassy field
B) A road and a bridge
C) A parking lot
D) A river

What can be seen to the left of the water tower?
A) A tree
B) A lamppost
C) A car
D) A person

What is the primary color of the water tower's legs?
A) Red
B) Green
C) Blue
D) Yellow

What is the shape of the water tower?
A) Cylindrical
B) Rectangular
C) Spherical
D) Cubical

What type of structure is seen in the background?
A) A residential house
B) A power tower
C) A shopping mall
D) A school

What is the condition of the sky?
A) Clear
B) Overcast
C) Stormy
D) Partly cloudy

What is the color of the bridge in the foreground?
A) Black
B) White
C) Gray
D) Blue

What is the dominant color in the photo?
A) Red
B) Green
C) Blue
D) Brown

What is the photo mainly focusing on?
A) The bridge
B) The water tower and the bridge in the foreground
C) The power lines
D) The sky

What is the condition of the bridge in the foreground?
A) New
B) Old and worn
C) Under construction
D) Collapsed

What does the water tower appear to be used for?
A) Storing water
B) Generating electricity
C) Broadcasting signals
D) Housing people

What is the height of the water tower relative to the bridge?
A) Much taller
B) Much shorter
C) The same height
D) Slightly shorter

What is the photo depicting?
A) A natural landscape
B) An urban infrastructure
C) A historical monument
D) A cultural event

What is the purpose of the power lines in the background?
A) Decorative
B) Electricity transmission
C) Communication
D) Support for the water tower

What is visible on the ground in the foreground?
A) Grass
B) Asphalt
C) Both A and B
D) Gravel

What is the primary material of the bridge in the foreground?
A) Wood
B) Steel
C) Concrete
D) Brick

What is the overall mood of the photo?
A) Bright and cheerful
B) Dark and gloomy
C) Calm and neutral
D) Busy and chaotic

What is the function of the lamppost in the photo?
A) To provide lighting
B) To support the water tower
C) To transmit signals
D) To decorate the area

What type of infrastructure is prominent in the photo?
A) Transportation
B) Water supply
C) Residential housing
D) Commercial buildings

What is the relationship between the water tower and the power lines?
A) They are connected
B) They are separate but nearby
C) The power lines support the water tower
D) The water tower supports the power lines

What is the design pattern on the water tower?
A) Stripes
B) Polka dots
C) Waves
D) Checkered

What is the structural integrity of the bridge in the foreground?
A) Intact and stable
B) Damaged and unstable
C) Under construction
D) Collapsed

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A busy street market
C) A water tower near a roadway
D) A family gathering
